title: 820-00928 DOES NOT GO OFF WITH THE  POWER BUTTON
message: Hello guys , have got an 820-00928 that the left fan runs really high ,and does not respond when I press and hold the power button to switch the machine off ( PLEASE NOTE THAT THE MACHINE POWERS UP AND BOOTS OKAY )  PM_PWRBTN_L remains high at 3.3V when I press the power Botton , even when I short the SW5200 on board, the signal does not go low. I. have replaced the SMC but still no changes , by the way SMC_ON/OFF_L signal is present at 3.3V .. please where do I go from here ?

title: 820-00928 DOES NOT GO OFF WITH THE  POWER BUTTON
message:
"SMC_ON/OFF_L signal is present at 3.3V"
Does it drop when pressing power button?

Start in diagnostic mode.

title: 820-00928 DOES NOT GO OFF WITH THE  POWER BUTTON
message: yes ,SMC_ON/OFF_L signal drops upon pressing the power button
